mapper.select: SELECT w.id, w.position_code_id, w.career_code_id, w.company_id, w.title, w.detail, w.view_count, w.created, w.enddate, c.company_name, c.region_code_name FROM wanteds w LEFT OUTER JOIN companys c ON w.company_id = c.id ORDER BY w.view_count DESC

SELECT w.id, w.position_code_id, w.career_code_id, w.company_id, w.title, w.detail, w.view_count, w.created, w.enddate, c.company_name, c.region_code_name FROM wanteds w LEFT OUTER JOIN companys c ON w.company_id = c.id WHERE w.position_code_id = ${positionCodeId} ORDER BY w.view_count DESC
